abstract: Mike Hale reviews PBS series Case Histories, starring Jason Isaacs, part of Masterpiece Mystery! lineup.
snippet: A series based on Kate Atkinson’s novels about the soft-hearted sleuth Jackson Brodie is the newest addition to the PBS catalog of programs borrowed from the BBC.
lead_paragraph: A series based on Kate Atkinson’s novels about the soft-hearted sleuth Jackson Brodie is the newest addition to the PBS catalog of programs borrowed from the BBC.

headline.main: This Detective Is Sharp but Also Introspective
headline.print_headline: This Detective Is Sharp But Also Introspective
headline.seo: Jackson Brodie Mysteries on PBS - Review
